name: get_trending_cryptos
description: Fetches a list of trending cryptocurrencies from coingecko

name: get_current_price
description: Fetches the current spot market price of a given cryptocurrency

name: get_sma_7_day
description: Calculates the 7-day Simple Moving Average for a given cryptocurrency

name: get_ema_8_day
description: Calculates the 8-day Exponential Moving Average for a given cryptocurrency

name: get_rsi_14_day
description: Calculates the 14-day Relative Strength Index for a given cryptocurrency

name: get_sma_200_day
description: Calculates the 200-day Simple Moving Average for a given cryptocurrency

name: get_ema_144_day
description: Calculates the 144-day Exponential Moving Average for a given cryptocurrency

name: get_rsi_50_day
description: Calculates the 50-day Relative Strength Index for a given cryptocurrency

name: get_macd_short
description: Calculates the short-term MACD for a given cryptocurrency

name: get_macd_long
description: Calculates the long-term MACD for a given cryptocurrency
